abstract: Twitter is a hit in Japan, succeeding where other social networking imports like Facebook have foundered as millions ”mumble” — the translation of tweet — and give mini-blogging a distinctly Japanese flavor, The Associated Press reports.
snippet: Twitter is a hit in Japan, succeeding where other social networking imports like Facebook have foundered as millions ”mumble” — the translation of tweet — and give mini-blogging a distinctly Japanese flavor, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: Big in Japan: Millions ‘Mumble’ on Twitter
